rationale: Describes research results (capability/measure) and links to real-world observation: 'Only one of those three animals became ill, suggesting... seems to be what's happening in the real world'.
statement_text: Only one of those three animals became ill, suggesting that the virus carried by cattle in the current outbreak is not well adapted to respiratory spread, the CDC wrote in a news release on the study. Only one of those three animals became ill, suggesting that the virus carried by cattle in the current outbreak is not well adapted to respiratory spread, the CDC wrote in a news release on the study. So far, that [the finding that the virus is not well adapted to respiratory spread] seems to be what's happening in the real world, too.
